newsitem.title: USA: Dave & Busters plans three new locations.
newsitem.headline: Dave & Busters plans three new locations.

text.p: Dave & Busters Inc said Tuesday it signed letters of intent to open three new restaurant-entertainment complexes in fiscal 1998.
The company said the new locations will be in Baltimore, Orange, Calif., and Irvine, Calif.

The company also said it has accelerated the schedule for opening a new location in Denver to the fourth quarter. The previously announced Rockland County, N.Y., location will open in the first quarter 1998, it said.
Dave & Busters currently operates 10 restaurant-entertainment complexes in the United States and one in the United Kingdom, the company said.
